version_description: · Bug fixing and optimizations

· Try Navionics+ for free for 15 days!
· Conveniently get the current weather conditions when opening the app and tap the screen for forecasts and more details
· Shop for sonar devices in Menu>Shop
· Bug fixing and optimizations

· Try Navionics+ for free for 15 days on any maps worldwide!
· Conveniently get the current weather conditions when opening the app and tap the screen for forecasts and more details
· Shop for sonar devices, mobile charts, as well as GPS plotter cards in Menu>Shop*
· Bug fixing and optimizations
Bug fixing and optimizations
Bug fixing and optimizations

• Your Navionics+ 15-day free trial now includes a track Timeline where you can see all the photos taken while tracking, POIs and Navionics panoramic images. Tap Start to begin!
• Plotter Sync is now enhanced with an improved user interface. Go to “Menu>Connect a device” in the app to begin.
• Visit Menu>Shop to see an improved design of the Navionics Store!
• Bug fixing and optimizations

- Improved Plotter Sync feature to allow Raymarine Wi-Fi compatible GPS chartplotters to connect to the app to activate eligble Navionics cards and renew subscriptions, in addition to original features
- An automatic route can also be started by tapping and holding on the map
- Two extra zoom levels added
- Improvements to the sun/moon display, sunrise/sunset in the Weather page
- Improved camera/video tool
- Search feature now at POI level
- Satellite and Terrain overlays are now part of Navionics+ subscription – try it for free!
- Bug fixing and optimizations

- Markers pinpointing your favorite locations and fishing spots are now increased to 1,000!
- Tap Menu > Inbox for stored messages from us, about tips, events, updates and more.
- Plotter Sync, which allows this app to connect to Raymarine chartplotters, now transfers routes and markers in a shorter amount of time. Also, the mobile screen will not lock to allow continued data transfer.
- Photos accessible from Timeline and from the map are now shown in an improved layout. It is also possible to add comments in the Timeline.
Bug fixing and optimizations

- Now also log into the app via Facebook: join the Navionics Community and team up with millions of boaters! Go to Menu>Settings>Log in.
- Personalize your app: add your boat’s name, photo and more. Also, select your preferred activities to receive content relevant to you! Go to Menu>Settings>Boat Settings.
- Search and sort Markers by name, type, date and distance from GPS. Go to Menu>Markers.
- If you have done Plotters Sync with your Raymarine at least once, you can conveniently renew your plotter card subscription from Menu>Device Connected!

- Compatible Lowrance, Simrad and B&G models, in addition to Raymarine MFDs, now support Plotter Sync! Directly from your boat: easily transfer routes & markers, update charts, activate and renew subscriptions of your plotter cards. Go to Menu>Connect a Device
- Easily search your Tracks and Routes
- Bug fixing & optimization
Bug fixing and optimizations

- Personalize the app by creating a profile with your picture, activities on the water, and settings, including plotter information. Go to Menu>Me.
- Easily check your sonar status directly from the app! Go to Menu>Connect a Device.
- Bug fixing & optimization
Bug fixing and optimizations

- Personalize the opening screen with a picture of your boat! Go to Menu > Me > Boat and upload a photo.
- Bug fixing and optimization.

- Opening screen renewed: your boat image and weather info more clearly visible
- Edit your boat and profile image to fit! Go to Menu > Me
- Bug fixing & optimizations

- New design and now optimized for iPhone X
- Easily transfer routes & markers, update charts, activate and renew subscriptions of your plotter card, and upload sonar logs by connecting plotter and mobile. Axiom and Axiom PROs with LightHouse III v3.3 (coming soon), in addition to many compatible models from other brands, support Plotter Sync. Go to Menu > Connect a Device to start.
- Bug fixing and optimizations
Bug fixing and optimization

- New design and now optimized for iPhone X
- Easily transfer routes & markers, update charts, activate and renew subscriptions of your plotter card, and upload sonar logs by connecting plotter and mobile. Axiom and Axiom PROs with LightHouse III v3.3 (coming soon), in addition to many compatible models from other brands, support Plotter Sync. Go to Menu > Connect a Device to start.
- Bug fixing and optimizations

- Easily check which account you’ve used to log in. Go to Menu > Me
- Bug fixing and optimization
- Bug fixing and optimization

We’re constantly making our app better! Be sure to update to the latest version which includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

[+] Tip: create an account or log to sync your tracks, routes and markers across all your devices! Just open the app to begin.

We’re constantly making our app better! Be sure to update to the latest version which includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

[+] Tip: create an account or log in to add Community Edits on the map and contribute your local knowledge. Just open the app to begin.
Bug fixing and optimization

[+] AIS improved: now you can customize the target’s vector length. Go to Menu > Map Options > AIS Settings > Vector Length.
[+] We’ve made some bug corrections and optimizations for a better app experience.

Tip: how to never lose your purchases and data. Login or create an account if you haven’t before.

[+] Drop a marker on your current location with one tap, directly from the map.

[+] Your Wi-Fi AIS receiver does not connect automatically to the app? Try adding it manually. Go to Menu > Connect a Device > Add Device

[+] AIS is here! See nearby targets overlaid on the map in real time. Just connect the app to a compatible Wi-Fi AIS receiver. Active subscription required. Go to Menu > Connect a device.

[+] Download all the maps you need without filling up your device. Conveniently delete maps and download them again later. Active subscription required. Go to Menu > Delete Maps.
Bug fixing and optimization.

[+] GPX Import/Export for tracks, routes and markers to:​
- Share them directly on your friends’ apps​
- Store them on your computer all at once
- Display them on different apps, plotters and other devices​
Go to Menu > Tracks / Routes / Markers > Select > Share. An active subscription is required

[+] Share your location or any other location on the map, with detailed info and coordinates. Use the cross-hair to target any spot > tap “?” > Share

[+] Bug fixing and optimization

> U.S. Government Charts (NOAA) are now included only in the coverage areas of the following subscriptions: USA, US & Canada, Caribbean & South America, Pacific Islands, Asia & Africa.

> If you want to clean up your archive, now you can delete all or multiple items at once. Go to Menu > Tracks, Routes or Markers > Select.

> Have you recently experienced a "Trial expired" message in error? Don’t worry — we fixed it, and you haven't lost your charts and subscription.

[+] Locate multiple fishing spots quickly and easily, with depth understanding at a glance! Customize your SonarChart™ map layer view with the Fishing Ranges feature! Available with an active subscription, go to Menu > Map Options.

> Join a bigger crowd! Get more local information from both the Navionics and the Garmin ActiveCaptain boaters’ community. Simply open the app and zoom in on the map!​
> You can now use this app on both iPhone and iPad. Sync charts and data among your devices: Go to Menu > Me > Subscription and restore your purchases.

> Join a bigger crowd! Get more local information from both the Navionics and the Garmin ActiveCaptain boaters’ community. Simply open the app and zoom in on the map!​
> You can now use this app on both iPhone and iPad. Sync charts and data among your devices: Go to Menu > Me > Subscription and restore your purchases.

> Join a bigger crowd! Get more local information from both the Navionics and the Garmin ActiveCaptain boaters’ community. Simply open the app and zoom in on the map!​
> You can now use this app on both iPhone and iPad. Sync charts and data among your devices: Go to Menu > Me > Subscription and restore your purchases.

> U.S. Government Charts (NOAA) are now included only in the coverage areas of the following subscriptions: USA, US & Canada, Caribbean & South America, Pacific Islands, Asia & Africa.

> If you want to clean up your archive, now you can delete all or multiple items at once. Go to Menu > Tracks, Routes or Markers > Select.

> Have you recently experienced a "Trial expired" message in error? Don’t worry — we fixed it, and you haven't lost your charts and subscription.
Bug fixing and optimization.

[+] GPX Import/Export for tracks, routes and markers to:​
- Share them directly on your friends’ apps​
- Store them on your computer all at once
- Display them on different apps, plotters and other devices​
Go to Menu > Tracks / Routes / Markers > Select > Share. An active subscription is required

[+] Share your location or any other location on the map, with detailed info and coordinates. Use the cross-hair to target any spot > tap “?” > Share

[+] Bug fixing and optimization

[+] AIS is here! See nearby targets overlaid on the map in real time. Just connect the app to a compatible Wi-Fi AIS receiver. Active subscription required. Go to Menu > Connect a device.

[+] Download all the maps you need without filling up your device. Conveniently delete maps and download them again later. Active subscription required. Go to Menu > Delete Maps.

[+] Drop a marker on your current location with one tap, directly form the map. ​

[+] Your Wi-Fi AIS receiver does not connect automatically to the app? Try adding it manually. Go to Menu > Connect a Device > Add Device.

[+] Drop a marker on your current location with one tap, directly from the map.

[+] Your Wi-Fi AIS receiver does not connect automatically to the app? Try adding it manually. Go to Menu > Connect a Device > Add Device

[+] AIS improved with target vectors. Understand vessel course and speed at a glance. Go to Menu > Map Options. ​

​[+] Share your boating experience. Edit, rate and review the ActiveCaptain® Community POIs directly in the app.

[+] AIS improved with target vectors. Understand vessel course and speed at a glance. Go to Menu > Map Options.

[+] Share your boating experience. Edit, rate and review the ActiveCaptain® Community POIs directly in the app.
Bug fixing and optimization

[+] AIS improved: now you can customize the target’s vector length. Go to Menu > Map Options > AIS Settings > Vector Length.
[+] We’ve made some bug corrections and optimizations for a better app experience.

Tip: how to never lose your purchases and data. Login or create an account if you haven’t before.

Now it is necessary to have an ACCOUNT. WHY?

> We recently linked the app subscription to the Navionics account. So that you can use JUST ONE SUBSCRIPTION across your devices.
> Plus, having an account will SECURE YOUR PURCHASES and SYNC YOUR CHARTS AND DATA across all your mobile devices.

Get a flawless, coherent and seamless experience.
Open the app and sign in.

[+] AIS improvements: 
- Don't miss approaching targets with the new AIS COLLISION ALARM. Just connect to an AIS device: Menu>Connect a Device. To customize AIS settings, go to: Menu>Map Options>AIS Settings. 
- Targets around you have stopped sending AIS signal? Now you can spot them at a glance: a red X will be placed on their icon.   

[+] Now you can remove previously connected devices: go to Menu>Connect a device>Tap the gear icon associated with the device> tap Forget device

[+] Your maps will never look the same:
- Get the new NAVIONICS SATELLITE OVERLAY WITH SONARCHART™ SHADING: a unique perspective of underwater topography at a glance. Download it from Menu>Download maps> “+” > SonarChart Shading > Download. Available with an active subscription.
- Easily unfold the different chart layers-overlay combinations thanks to the new redesigned Map Option section. Go to Menu>Map Option.

[+] Route color has changed for better viewing. Goodbye blue, hello magenta.

[+] We also added some new cool marker icons.

[+] Get the NEW overlay RELIEF SHADING (currently available only in U.S., check coverage at navionics.com) for an easy-to-interpret, clearer view of bottom structure than contour lines alone. Available with an active subscription. Download it: Menu>Download Maps>+>Relief Shading. Display it: Menu>Map Options.

[+] Dashes indicating restricted areas borders now have a T shape so it’s easier to differentiate the inside of the area from the outside.

- Spotting fish holding areas at a glance is easier than ever. Now you can combine the customizable multiple depths ranges of Fishing ranges with the unique bottom prospective of SonarChart Shading and relief shading (check coverage at navionics.com). ​

- Easily check point of interest detailed information without losing sight of the chart thanks to the new user interface.
- Bug fixing and optimization.

- Bring your info with you: now profile picture, activities and boat settings will be synced automatically across all your devices.

- Bug fixing and optimization.
- Bug fixing and optimization.
- Bug fixing and optimization.

- Connections feature is here to help you stay in touch with your friends and fellow boaters. Share your live location with them to easily meet on the water or let them check out your adventures. To start connecting now, go to Menu>Connections.

- Remember that profile picture, activities, and boat settings are synced automatically across all your devices.
- Bug fixing and optimization.

- This is the last version that supports iOS 10.0 and 11.0. Future app versions will be available only for iOS 12.0 or higher. In case you cannot upgrade your operating system, you will still be able to use this app version.

- Discover the new sonar imagery overlay, which reveals bottom hardness clearly in a contrasting display so you can easily identify transition areas and find the best spots to cast your lure. Available on select U.S. lakes; check the list on Navionics.com/usa.
- Bug fixing and optimization.
- Bug fixing and optimization.
- Bug fixing and optimization.
- Bug fixing and optimization.
